page.title: 16BECKFIELD HOUSE HEIGHINGTON.
page.content: Beckfield House is situated on Station Road surrounded by tall, shady trees.It was eight years ago since Mrs Birch and her husband started Beckfield House as an old peoples home. As there is no special day for visitors people are coming and going all the time. There are twenty six people living there at the moment. As there has now been a new wing built they can take in even more people in, before it was built there was only fifteen people living there. Twenty two people work there,that inculdes the two cooks. There is no waiting list as by the time they have room for someone else they will either have died or moved away.Mrs Birch is not strict as she wants the people to feel at home.
